document_data.caption: A cittern from [[Aurora's Emporium]].
document_data.name: Cittern
document_data.Description: Citterns had four sets of paired strings that produced a rich array of tones and were said to "add spice to peasant music" by the [[Patriarch of Song]] in [[Waterdeep]].
document_data.Availability:
* ''[[Aurora's Whole Realms Catalogue (in-universe)|Aurora's Whole Realms Catalogue]]'' sold citterns among its catalogue of instruments.
* [[Black Dugal's Music Shoppe]] in the city of [[Ravens Bluff]] was known to sell citterns.{{Cite polyhedron/56/The Living City: Black Dugal's Music Shoppe|24}}
document_data.Notable citterns:
* ''[[The Cittern of War]]'': A variety of [[enchanted]] citterns that were approved of by the [[Church of Tempus]].
* ''[[Mac-Fuirmidh cittern]]'': One of the seven [[Instrument of the Bards|Instruments of the Bards]]. These were magical citterns that had protecting and healing magic, as well as other magical powers.
* ''[[Tangled Strings]]'': A magic cittern with music that can clear a confused mind.
